import axios from 'axios'; import { useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const AddStudents = () => { const [student, setStudent] = useState({ firstName: '', LastName: '', email: '', depatment: '' }) const { firstName, LastName, email, depatment } = student; const handleInputChange = (e) => { setStudent({ ...student, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); } const saveStudent = async () => { await axios.post("http://localhost:8080/students", student,) } return (
